subject: fix: resolve TagsTab initialization crash — self-referential const assignment
body:
TagsTab.jsx line 13 had `const CHART_TEXT_COLOR = CHART_TEXT_COLOR` which
read the variable during its own initialization (temporal dead zone). In the
minified production build this surfaced as `Cannot access 'vf' before
initialization`. Fixed by reading the --text-secondary CSS variable via
getComputedStyle() at module load, matching the pattern used in main.jsx.
